message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe its value far exceeds $1200000, reflecting its exceptional features and exclusivity. To ensure a fair transaction, we are initially offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1500000. This is an opportunity not only to acquire an extraordinary piece but also to secure a significant investment. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your interests or if you would like to discuss further details.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to consider your product. However, $1500000 is at the upper end of my budget. To make this a viable deal, I'd be willing to offer $1200000.  This reflects the value I see in the product at this time. I'm eager to explore this further and see if we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
